item.title: Evaluating the zero trust hype
item.description: Security vendors are touting the benefits of "zero trust" as the new way to approach security and security-conscious architecturing. But while there are principles within the zero trust mindset that came up in the last dozen years, most of the content in zero trust discussions is tied to age-old security propositions.
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
